articles.title: CPRK Spokesman Urges S. Korean Authorities to Face Up to Trend of Times
articles.content:
CPRK Spokesman Urges S. Korean Authorities to Face Up to Trend of Times
Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities in a statement of the Ministry of Unification and press briefing on Monday totally declined the DPRK's offer for a joint event to mark June 15, saying that "its sincerity is doubtful," "it is to create discord among those in the south" and that "it seeks a political aim".
					They also openly declared the stand not to allow south Korean businessmen's visit to the Kaesong Industrial Zone (KIZ), trumpeting about "south-north authorities' dialogue for carrying out of raw and other materials and finished products." 
					
					Worse still, they urged the DPRK to control "words and deeds," speaking ill of its due criticism of the reckless remarks made by the Chongwadae chief hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its new line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					
					The spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in a statement on Tuesday termed this a shameless challenge to the public opinion at home and abroad for detente and improvement of inter-Korean relations and a grave provocation against the DPRK as it revealed the anti-reunification moves for confrontation.
					
					The poor sophism of the south Korean authorities and their moves of disallowing the north-south joint events for reunification are an unpardonable insult to the mindset of the south Korean people and the aspiration of fellow countrymen as they fully brought to light their true colors as anti-reunification elements denying the north-south joint declarations and disliking reconciliation and unity, the statement said, and went on:
					
					The reckless remarks made by the south Korean authorities go to fully prove that they do not want improvement of inter-Korean relations, dialogue and detente and that the puppet group has nothing but a sinister intention to continue resorting to the moves for confrontation with the DPRK in league with the U.S.
					
					It is the last-ditch efforts of those upset by the failure of their scheme of anti-DPRK cooperation due to the rapidly changing situation in the surrounding areas.
					
					The puppet group is seriously mistaken if it thinks its trick will help it get something, getting rid of a tight corner.
					
					The south Korean authorities should stop a useless wordplay and immediately allow organizations of the south side to participate in the June 15 joint events.
					
					If they are concerned about "contradiction among south Koreans", they can take part in the reunification events themselves.
					
					They should also open the way for businessmen to visit the KIZ.
					
					We have already consented to the businessmen's visit to the KIZ and if they enter it, we are ready to hold any discussion on the normalization of the KIZ including the issue of carrying out products.
					
					The south Korean authorities do not need to worry about their safety. 
					
					If they still do not feel reassured, they may send with them members of the Committee for Operating the Kaesong Industrial Zone.
					
					The south Korean authorities would be well advised to clearly face up to the trend of the times and the people's mindset and opt for a correct way, though belatedly.

articles.title: Greetings to Azerbaijani President
articles.content:
Greetings to Azerbaijani President
Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a message of greeting to Ilham Aliyev, president of Azerbaijan, on the occasion of its national day.
					Kim in the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop on good terms and wished the president and the people of Azerbaijan success in their efforts to realize the socio-political stability and the modernization of the economy.

articles.title: Congratulations to Malaysian Foreign Minister
articles.content:
Congratulations to Malaysian Foreign Minister
Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Monday sent a congratulatory message to Datuk Anifah Aman upon his reappointment as foreign minister of Malaysia.
					The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in various fields through the close cooperation between the foreign ministries and wished him success in his work.

articles.title: DPRK Athlete Proves Successful at Chinese Taipei Track and Field Tournament
articles.content:
DPRK Athlete Proves Successful at Chinese Taipei Track and Field Tournament
Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- DPRK woman athlete Pak Kum Hyang won a gold medal by finishing first at the 3,000 meter women's hurdle race at the 2013 Chinese Taipei Track and Field Tournament.
					The tournament held in Taipei of China on Monday and Tuesday brought together athletes from various countries and regions including the DPRK, Indonesia, Taipei of China and Hong Kong, China.
					
					Meanwhile, another DPRK athlete Jang Chun Ye bagged a silver medal at the 1,500 meter women's race.

articles.title: New Agricultural Chemicals, Organic Fertilizers Applied to Farming in DPRK
articles.content:
New Agricultural Chemicals, Organic Fertilizers Applied to Farming in DPRK
Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- New kinds of agricultural chemicals and organic fertilizers have been applied to farming in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					They include maize seed-covering material, rice nursery herbicide, eurytropic herbicide, organic compound fertilizer, nitrogen humate compound fertilizer and phosphorus bacterial fertilizer.
					
					The maize seed-covering material is composed of 20 percent of insecticide, 40 percent of growth promoter and various kinds of other nutrient elements. It is effective for killing earthworm and accelerating initial growth of crops.
					
					The eurytropic herbicide is appropriate to killing annual and perennial weeds in rice nurseries and rice-transplanted and rice-sown fields.
					
					The phosphorus bacterial and multielement mineral fertilizers are effective for preventing ceitocybe bescens and bacterial leaf blight and raising the yield of grain and vegetables.
					
					Kim Chi Yong, director of the Institute of Agricultural Chemicalization under the Academy of Agricultural Science, told KCNA that many local co-op farms have benefited from the application of those agricultural chemicals and organic fertilizers.

articles.title: Successes Achieved in Spring Land Management
articles.content:
Successes Achieved in Spring Land Management
Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Officials and other people in various parts of the DPRK have achieved successes in the spring general mobilization for land management.
					They planted trees in areas covering at least 140,000 hectares, technically improved roads extending more than 590 km in total length and rivers and streams extending over 2,100 km.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Denounces S. Korean Regime's Human Rights Racket against DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Denounces S. Korean Regime's Human Rights Racket against DPRK
Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet Ministry of Unification is taking the lead in the "human rights" racket against the DPRK.
					Ryu Kil Jae, minister of Unification, at an anti-DPRK "human rights" farce staged in Seoul under the signboard of an international meeting, blustered that "he would work out a key plan for the improvement of human rights in the north". He even called on the attendants to "respond" to the "efforts to improve human rights in the north" through "a confidence-building process".
					
					This is nothing but a cynical ploy to build up public opinion on the non-existent "human rights issue" in the DPRK in a bid to tarnish its dignified image and ratchet up the atmosphere of confrontation with it internally and externally. 
					
					Much upset by their repeated setbacks in the military and political showdown with the DPRK, the south Korean puppet forces are getting frantic with an anti-DPRK "human rights" racket.
					
					The Ministry of Unification is playing the role of a shock force in carrying out the puppet group of traitors' sinister scenario to achieve "unification of social systems" at any cost through a "human rights" campaign plus a nuclear racket.
					
					Whenever an opportunity presents itself, mandarins of the ministry blustered that "the north's access to nukes is intolerable", "south-north cooperation is impossible as long as the north keeps nukes". They are becoming vocal slandering the DPRK's will to take toughest counter actions, urging it to "stop provocations" and "make a right option." They are working hard to bar the fundamental solution to the crisis in the Kaesong Industrial Zone and shift the blame for it onto the DPRK.
					
					Turning a blind eye to the human rights abuses in south Korea, the world's worst tundra of human rights, the ministry is busy finding fault with the human rights performance in the DPRK. This is nothing but a thrice-cursed act of inciting confrontation with compatriots.
					
					Now is the time to take serious and condemn the most hideous human rights abuses the military gangsters committed in May, 33 years ago by turning Kwangju City into a scene of genocide. The south Korean puppet forces, however, are busy with a smear campaign by staging a "human rights" farce against the DPRK.  Nothing is more ridiculous ruckus than this.
					
					The present ruling forces in south Korea are busy embellishing the erstwhile military dictatorial rule which cold-bloodedly put down the Kwangju Popular Uprising, distorting history and suppressing the freedom and democracy of the people. 
					
					It is preposterous, indeed, for them to talk about someone's "human rights" though they are not in a position to complain about the evermore undisguised human rights abuses committed by GIs in south Korea. 
					
					No wonder, the south Korean people ridicule the Ministry of Unification as a "vanished ministry" as it is hell-bent on the moves to escalate confrontation with compatriots through an anti-DPRK human rights racket. 
					
					The group of traitors will never be able to escape a severe punishment by the nation as it is keen on confrontation and war in collusion with outside forces.

articles.title: Minju Joson Denounces U.S. War Drill Targeted against DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Denounces U.S. War Drill Targeted against DPRK
Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- The U.S. staged an informal war exercise together with Japan and south Korea in the open sea southeast of Jeju Island on May 15. 
					Minju Joson Tuesday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					This was saber-rattling aimed to make a military strike at the DPRK to all intents and purposes. 
					
					The military action on the Korean Peninsula where a tense military and political situation is prevailing is as dangerous as playing with fire on a powder magazine, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					On May 13 and 14 the U.S. and south Korea staged a joint naval drills aiming at a naval strike at the DPRK with super-large nuclear-powered carrier Nimitz strike force involved. 
					
					Not content with this, the U.S. staged the above-said military drill, again pushing the situation on the peninsula to the brink of war. 
					
					This is what the U.S. is doing now while paying lip-service to "peace and stability" in the region and "peace" in the world.
					
					The U.S. pretends to be concerned about "peace" and "detente" but its ulterior intention is to escalate the tension and ignite a war. 
					
					It is the strategic scenario of Washington to steadily escalate the tension on the Korean Peninsula and create an atmosphere favorable for knocking into shape an aggressive U.S.-Japan-south Korea military bloc and attain a military edge in the Asia-Pacific region on the basis of NATO of Asian version. 
					
					This indicates that the U.S. is the arch criminal disturbing peace and stability in the Asia-Pacific region and the rest of the world. 
					
					The U.S. is sadly mistaken if it calculates it can browbeat the DPRK through increased military pressure.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Reckless Remarks
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Reckless Remarks
Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a bylined article slams the U.S. for seeking to justify its hostile policy toward the DPRK and attain its sinister purpose by painting the DPRK as "poser of threats" and "provoker". 
					Some time ago, U.S. Secretary of State Kerry said that nukes and missiles of the DPRK threatened peace and security of Northeast Asia. He urged the DPRK to show sincerity concerning denuclearization. Prior to this, the U.S. chief executive and the special representative for north Korea policy of the U.S. Department of State stressed the need to lure the DPRK to change, expressing the will not to wait for it to do so. 
					
					The U.S. claims that "threats" come from nukes and missiles of the DPRK but this is just ridiculous sophism, the paper says, and goes on: 
					
					Washington's rhetoric about "threat" is part of its shameless scheme to cover up its true colors as a real culprit of nuclear threats and shift the blame for it on to others. 
					
					High-ranking officials of the U.S. vociferated about the "threats" and "provocations" at a time when a joint military drill for invasion of the DPRK was under way in south Korea and its vicinity. 
					
					Deeds of the U.S. authorities make the DPRK know well what they really desire. 
					
					Under the condition of ceaseless nuclear threats by Washington, Pyongyang will not unilaterally abandon its war deterrence, suffering sacrifice. This is the lesson it drew from the crisis of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					If the U.S. tries to change the DPRK with mean plots as now, it will make a big failure. If it truly wants peace of the peninsula, it should comprehensively withdraw the nuclear war equipment from south Korea and its vicinity and drop the hostile policy toward the DPRK with the decision not to throw them into this region again.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Refutes Japanese Politicians' Rigmaroles Denying Crime-woven History
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Refutes Japanese Politicians' Rigmaroles Denying Crime-woven History
Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, Takaichi, chairman of the Policy Research Council of the Liberal Democratic Party of Japan, grumbled that he does not agree with "Murayama's statement" in which he made an apology for the colonial domination and aggression in the past. By doing so, he revealed his viewpoint denying the crime-woven history of the Japanese imperialists.
					Osaka Mayor Hashimoto, co-head of the Japan Restoration Party, also openly denied the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army. 
					
					Co-head Ishihara and General Secretary Matsui of the same party and other politicians vied with each other to talk rubbish backing Hashimoto's balderdash, stressing the necessity of sexual slavery at that time.
					
					Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					It was more than once that the Japanese ruling forces were free to let loose a spate of outbursts tampering with Japan's history, but they have never uttered such whole string of jargons as this time.
					
					The Japanese political camp has seriously lurched to the Right, rushing headlong into ultra-right actions and militarism.
					
					Whenever opportunities present themselves, either ruling or opposition politicians make no scruple of chanting slogans for the denial of the past history, revision of the Constitution and the conversion of Japan into a military giant.
					
					The denial of the crime-woven history reveals a scenario to make the crime-woven past repeat itself.
					
					By denying and embellishing the Japanese imperialists' history of aggression, the Japanese reactionary ruling forces seek to call back the departed soul of militarists and launch reinvasion. Herein lies a criminal scenario of the Japanese politicians.
					
					This is, however, as foolish an act as inviting disasters.
					
					Japan is left with no option but to honestly admit its crime-woven history and make an apology and reparation for all its wrongs.

articles.title: S. Korea to Stage Another DPRK-targeted War Drills
articles.content:
S. Korea to Stage Another DPRK-targeted War Drills
Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet warmongers announced that they would stage Thaeguk military drills, another north-targeted ones, from May 29 to 31, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					Vociferating about "threat of provocation by the north", they are mulling staging those drills with the involvement of the force from the units under the Ministry of Defence and corps-level ones. They seek to form the combat staff force combining the puppet Joint Chiefs of Staff and operation commands of different services.
					
					Loudly speaking of "confidence" and "dialogue" in public, the puppet warmongers are staging mad-cap war drills against the DPRK behind the scene. Their heinous anti-DPRK confrontation racket is being censured at home and abroad.

articles.title: S. Korean Unification Minister's Reckless Remarks under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Unification Minister's Reckless Remarks under Fire
Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, Ryu Kil Jae, puppet minister of Unification of south Korea, cried out for "working out a key plan on human rights in the north" by pushing ahead with efforts to institute a "law on human rights in the north." He even urged the north to "fulfill its main duty to solve the human rights issue" and "drop its attitude of making provocations."
					Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard: What Ryu uttered is nothing but jargons let loose by a confrontation maniac to fan up bitterness toward the DPRK and worsen the inter-Korean relations. 
					
					The DPRK shapes all policies and conducts all its activities under the slogan "Everything for the people and solution to every issue in reliance upon them!" Human rights are deeply respected and fully guaranteed in the country.
					
					It is south Korea which is beset with a serious human rights problem, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					It is ridiculous, indeed, for the south Korean puppet authorities to speak volumes about the above-said odd things though they are not in a position to mind their own business after having turned south Korea into the world's worst tundra of human rights. 
					
					What should not be overlooked is that Ryu dared urge the DPRK to "drop its attitude of making provocations." His outpourings are aimed to mislead public opinion in a bid to cover up the responsibility for having created a touch-and-go situation on the Korean Peninsula and label the DPRK "provocateur." 
					
					The puppet forces should clearly know that their anti-DPRK human rights racket would get them nowhere but precipitate their self-destruction.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Moves to Revive "Yusin" Dictatorship under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Moves to Revive "Yusin" Dictatorship under Fire
Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean ruling forces' moves to revive the "yusin" dictatorship are reckless acts against human rights and democracy as they are totally opposed to the desires of people of broad social strata in south Korea for social progress and democratization.
					Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a bylined article in this regard:
					
					The above-said moves have become extremely undisguised in south Korea. The present puppet ruling quarters are now making desperate efforts to reverse the trend of the historical development toward democracy and justice, openly praising the crimes committed in the era of the military dictatorship and distorting history. They make no scruple of enforcing an unpopular repressive policy against the demands and interests of the people, while rendering the power mechanism more tyrannical. Now rampant in south Korea are political inspections and plot-breeding farces by repressive organs including the Intelligence Service and violence by the judicial authorities. They remind one of the era of the past "yusin" dictatorship which was ill-famed for horror-ridden politics. As a result, the confrontation between the progressive and conservative forces has reached the height and the south Koreans' expectation and hope for democracy and justice have been dashed. The present situation of south Korea goes to clearly prove once again that the public view that the conservatives' re-seizure of power is just an extension of the dictatorial "government", was by no means fortuitous. 
					
					The present ruling forces' moves to revive the "yusin" dictatorship are nothing but a blatant challenge and a heinous treachery against the democratization craved by the south Korean people.
					
					Their traitorous moves can never come true as they persist in the revival of the "yusin" dictatorship, swimming against the desires of the people from all walks of life.
					
					It is the inevitability of history that the south Korean puppet ruling forces are bound to ruin by the struggle of people of various social standings desirous of independence, democracy and reunification.

articles.title: Serious Environmental Pollution Caused by GIs in South Korea
articles.content:
Serious Environmental Pollution Caused by GIs in South Korea
Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Environmental pollution caused by the U.S. aggressor forces is becoming a serious problem in south Korea.
					Areas covering at least 12 200 square meters have been polluted since the oil leakage from the U.S. military base in Ryongsan, Seoul in 2001.
					
					About 7.18 million liters of underground water were polluted and 5.8 billion won was spent for purifying it.
					
					The Seoul City side informed the U.S. Forces Command in south Korea and the U.S. embassy there of this serious situation and urged them to inquire into the pollution at the base but no measure has been taken.

articles.title: Successful June 15 Events Called for
articles.content:
Successful June 15 Events Called for
Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- The permanent chairman of the U.S. Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in a statement on May 22 called for successfully ensuring the June 15 events common to the nation.
					The statement fully supported and warmly hailed the offer of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration on holding the events common to the nation represented by Koreans in the north, south and overseas on the occasion of the 13th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					The joint declaration was provided by the top leaders of the north and the south for the first time in the history of division, reflecting the noble desire of all the fellow countrymen for the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea, it said.
					
					But since the conservative regime emerged in south Korea the historic joint declaration has been totally denied, the north-south relations, which had developed on good terms, were totally derailed and the June 15 events common to the nation, which had jointly been conducted by the north, the south and overseas, were not opened, it charged.
					
					The Lee Myung Bak regime ditched the tour of Mt. Kumgang and then the present regime pushed the Kaesong Industrial Zone into a crisis of collapse, it held.
					
					To implement the June 15 joint declaration is the only way of opening a new phase of independent reunification in the spirit of "By our nation itself", it said.
					
					It urged the south Korean authorities to immediately accept the offer of the north side on holding the June 15 events common to the nation.

articles.title: Serbian Political Party Denounces U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
Serbian Political Party Denounces U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK
Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- The New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia issued a statement on May 20 against the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					The situation on the Korean Peninsula is worsening day by day due to the ceaseless moves of the U.S. to stifle the DPRK, the statement said, adding:
					
					Despite the unanimous condemnation of the peace-loving people in the world, the U.S. introduced the super-large nuclear-powered aircraft carrier Nimitz strike force and B-52s into the peninsula in the wake of its large-scale Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills.
					
					The U.S. engagement in arms buildup, DPRK-targeted war drills and massive deployment of nuclear weapons and troops in south Korea are mainly ascribable to its strategy of focusing on the Asia-Pacific region aimed at increasing domination in the region with the peninsula as a springboard.
					
					The U.S. immediate termination of aggressive war drills and withdrawal of all nuclear war means from south Korea and its vicinity are the only way for guaranteeing peace in the region.
					
					The New Yugoslav Communist Party is firmly convinced of the certain victory of the Korean people in defending socialism under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					It ardently calls on all the peace-loving people in the world to positively support the measures taken by the DPRK for self-defence in the showdown with the U.S.

articles.title: DPRK Supported in Guinea
articles.content:
DPRK Supported in Guinea
Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Lectures on the themes of "Rosy future of the DPRK" and "Architect of the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula" were given in Guinea on May 13 and 14.
					Praising the dear respected Kim Jong Un as a great successor to the Juche-oriented revolutionary cause which covered the protracted historical course crowned with victory and glory, the director of a Guinean seafood and fishing tackle export-import company said:
					
					Kim Jong Un saw to it that the Kumsusan Memorial Palace where President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il lie in state was renamed the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun.
					
					Statues of leader Kim Jong Il are being erected on the highest level in the DPRK.
					
					Kim Jong Un is wisely leading the revolution and construction, true to the ideas and intention of the preceding leaders.
					
					He is a great man who has firm faith in the Juche-oriented revolutionary cause, ardent love for the people, profound political insight and wisdom and outstanding leadership art.
					
					The victory of the cause of building a thriving nation is fully guaranteed as he leads the DPRK.
					
					Immensely rosy is the future of the DPRK.
					
					An officer of the Guinean army cited facts to disclose the root cause of the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula and the large-scale military war drills being staged by the U.S. in collusion with south Korea every year.
					
					He went on:
					
					The DPRK has paid special attention to settling the nuclear issue from long time ago as it has been exposed to constant nuclear threat by the U.S.
					
					However, the latter didn't implement the commitments it made with the former but singled it out as an "axis of evil" and a target of preemptive nuclear strike.
					
					So, the DPRK couldn't but have access to nuclear deterrent for self-defence.
					
					The U.S. is wholly to blame for the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					Although the DPRK has nuclear deterrent, its ultimate goal is to realize denuclearization.
					
					The U.S. can never escape the buck for the nuclear issue on the peninsula.
					
					Now is the time for the U.S. to show its responsible attitude.
					
					Another officer said that no force on earth can match the Korean People's Army which is fully ready in politics, ideology and military technique.
					
					The KPA is holding HE Kim Jong Un, another brilliant commander, in high esteem as its supreme commander.
					
					Its invincible spirit and might will get stronger.

articles.title: World Media Support DPRK
articles.content:
World Media Support DPRK
Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- The world fair media voiced support for the Korean people all out in confrontation with the U.S. now that the U.S. is misleading the public to evade the responsibility for the deteriorated situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					The media in a series of commentaries brought to light the sinister intention and nature of the U.S. which disturbs peace on the peninsula and in Asia and other parts of the world.
					
					The Russian papers Sovetskaya Rossiya, Tribuna and Zavtra, the Egyptian paper Sautl Balad, the Brazilian paper Hora do Povo and other media carried commentaries like "Who threatens peace on the Korean Peninsula?" and "U.S. is responsible for DPRK's access to nukes" and "Why is space exploration necessary for the DPRK?"
					
					The Austrian paper Wiener Zeitung dismissed some media's assertion that the DPRK caused a crisis in violation of international law.
					
					The Korean Peninsula is an outpost necessary to Washington for invading the continent, the paper stated, and went on:
					
					Washington got fussy about branding the peaceful satellite of the DPRK as an unjust act in a bid to justify its aggression moves. 
					
					Washington's design is to stifle Pyongyang. It is the U.S. which escalated the DPRK-U.S. confrontation into a nuclear-to-nuclear one.
					
					If Washington had not introduced nuclear weapons into south Korea, the peninsula would have already become denuclearized.
					
					Halo Noviny, a paper of the Czech Republic, said the U.S. always feels the need to have enemy and makes one if not. The DPRK has become the first target of the U.S. If Washington wants a war, it can launch it anytime which will be preceded by provocation. Washington subsists by creating a horror-ridden atmosphere by sparking off conflict with the enemy. It is Washington's policy to stifle Pyongyang.
					
					The Cuban paper Granma said Washington is fanning up the tension on the peninsula with the introduction of modern war hardware. The paper added that the tense situation on the peninsula is what is desired by Washington to expand its influence to the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					The world media support the Korean people in their just cause of confronting the U.S. and its hostile forces with tougher measures and are sure of Songun Korea's final victory.
					
					The Indonesian paper Siputar Indonesia, the Syrian paper Al Nour and other foreign papers carried articles titled "DPRK's nuclear weapons provide power for ensuring peace" and "Peace and A-bomb". They mentioned the prospect of the DPRK-U.S. nuclear confrontation, highlighting the justice of the Korean army and people in their struggle to defend the sovereignty.
					
					The Ria-Novosti News Agency of Russia said that the DPRK's access to the nuclear deterrent to defend the national sovereignty and security is a fine example of the nuclear-related countries being exposed to the international interference. 
					
					The Korean Friendship Association on its website noted it is the unchanged stand of Pyongyang to counter the enemies' daggers with long swords, their rifles with guns and their nuclear threat with stronger precision nuclear strike means.
					
					The Fourth Media News, a website of China, said as follows:
					
					New genuine power Korea is leading the international situation.
					
					Pyongyang's successes in the launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 and third underground nuclear test were big achievements of great significance in human history as they were made under the worst long circumstances beyond imagination.
					
					These achievements amount to the announcement to the world that it not only bolstered the nuclear deterrent but succeeded in developing the intercontinental ballistic missile capable of delivering nuclear weapons to the U.S. mainland.
					
					Through confrontation Pyongyang is forcing Washington to stand the final trial.
					
					The La Voz del Obrero Radio Broadcasting Service of Peru said socialist Korea would hold fast to the revolutionary principles and take the way of further bolstering the nuclear deterrent by simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force as long as the U.S. keeps its hostile acts.
					
					The world progressive people and working class extend invariable support and solidarity to the heroic Koreans, the radio said, confirming the DPRK's certain victory in the nuclear confrontation with the U.S.
					
					The website of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea said: 
					
					As recognized by the world, the DPRK is a country which is strong in independence, a country which does whatever it is determined to do.
					
					Through the satellite launch and nuclear test the DPRK once again demonstrated to the world that independence represents truth and truth is sure to win.
					
					The world would clearly witness how the Korean army and people all out to defend the sovereignty win final victory.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre empresa pesquera adscrita a la unidad 313 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre empresa pesquera adscrita a la unidad 313 del EPC
Pyongyang, 28 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Empresa Pesquera 25 de Agosto adscrita a la unidad 313 del EPC.
					Tras estrechar la mano con todos los oficiales de la unidad y los funcionarios de la empresa que le recibieron, el subio a un barco pesquero.
					
					Hace falta capturar muchos peces con estos buenos barcos para suministrarlos sin interrupcion en las 4 estaciones del ano a los militares en el frente avanzado, dijo y agrego que asi se puede sacar provechos reales de esas embarcaciones preparadas por el partido.
					
					En la cabina de maquina, pregunto en detalles como ha sido estructurada ella y cuanto es el consumo de combustible durante la operacion de la maquina y la potencia de esta.
					
					Pasando revista al camarote delantero y el intermedio, instruyo acondicionarlos bien en el principio de garantizar el confort a los tripulantes y enseno la experiencia de una base pesquera que aprovecha con eficiencia el calor residual derivado del barco.
					
					Encomendo tomar medidas para que puedan descansar en lugar caliente los pescadores, quienes trabajan en el mar mojandose las manos con aguas frias.
					
					Cada barco debe pescar anualmente mil toneladas, apunto y anadio que escribieran carta al Comandante Supremo si cumplen con ese plan de pesca. 
					
					En el EPC se levanta ahora la ola de cultivo de soya y hay que pescar mucho para suministrar sin interrupcion la soya y el pescado a los militares, resalto.
					
					Mirando a los oficiales y funcionarios de la empresa, quienes le solicitaron bautizar los barcos, el Mariscal propuso nombrarlos como "Tanphung" (hoja enrojecida) como simbolo de otono.
					
					Recorrio luego el monumento a la orientacion en el terreno del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien dio instrucciones importantes durante su visita a la empresa, hecha el 25 de agosto del 1973, y la sala de presentacion del historial.
					
					Seguidamente, acudio al almacen de instrumentos de pesca y la sala de refrigeracion.
					
					Para incrementar la produccion de productos maritimos, es preciso pescar mucho y cultivar en grandes cantidades las algas, laminarias, almejas y etc., indico.
					
					Recorri hace poco la base de abastecimiento de costa oriental adscrita a la unidad 639 del EPC, dijo y continuo que esa base capturo muchos pescados al mejorar el abastecimiento a los pescadores y asentar sobre la base cientifica la pesca. Esta empresa tambien debe aprender el modo de trabajo y las experiencias de esa base, enfatizo.
					
					El Mariscal tomo una foto de recuerdo con los funcionarios y empleados de la empresa. 
					
					En esta ocasion el fue acompanado por Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Kyok Sik, Jang Jong Nam, Ri Yong Gil, Son Chol Ju, Ryom Chol Song, Jon Chang Bok, Yun Tong Hyon, Jo Kyong Chol, An Ji Yong, Kim Su Gil y Hwang Pyong So.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Azerbaiján
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Azerbaiján
Pyongyang, 28 de mayo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la República Popular Democrática de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envió este martes un mensaje de felicitación al presidente de la República de Azerbaiján, Ilham Aliyev, con motivo del Día Nacional de ese país.
					El remitente expresa la convicción de que se desarrollarán favorablemente las relaciones de amistad y cooperación entre los dos países y desea al mandatario y su pueblo éxitos en los esfuerzos por lograr la estabilidad sociopolítica y la modernización de la economía.

articles.title: ACNC denuncia alborotos de "DDHH" anti-RPDC de Sur de Corea
articles.content:
ACNC denuncia alborotos de "DDHH" anti-RPDC de Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 28 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Ministerio titere de Unificacion del Sur de Corea esta al frente de los alborotos de "DDHH" de las fuerzas enemigas contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					En una reunion internacional recien efectuada en Seul, el ministro  surcoreano de Unificacion Ryu Kil Jae dijo que "establecera el plan principal para la mejora de derechos humanos del Norte de Corea" y el "Norte de Corea debe sumarse a los esfuerzos por la mejora de derechos humanos a traves del proceso de confianza".
					
					Esto es un acto criminal para manchar la digna imagen de la RPDC e inculcar mas el  ambiente conflictiva anti-RPDC en el interior y exterior del pais difundiendo en la sociedad surcoreana el inexistente "problema de DDHH" de la RPDC.
					
					Una vez que fracaso de continuo en la confrontacion politica y militar con la RPDC, la banda titere recurre con mas frenesi a los alborotos de "DDHH" anti-RPDC para recuperar su imagen.
					
					El Ministerio de Unificacion se ha hecho brigada de choque de la banda traidora del Sur de Corea en realizar la ambicion de  "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes" armando alborotos nucleares y de "DDHH" anti-RPDC.
					
					La banda del "Ministerio de Unificacion" suele decir que "no puede tolerar la posesion de armas nucleares del Norte de Corea", "es imposible las cooperaciones intercoreanas con el Norte que posee las armas nucleares" y nos aconseja el "cese de provocacion" y la "opcion correcta" en cuanto a la voluntad de contramedida superdura de la RPDC. Impide obstinadamente la solucion fundamental del caso de la Zona Industrial de Kaesong e nos imputa la responsabilidad del caso.
					
					Dando espalda a la realidad del Sur de Corea que se convirtio en el infierno de DDHH, el Ministerio de Unificacion censura la realidad de DDHH de la RPDC, lo que es una locura de confrontacion fratricida.
					
					En vez de cuestionar y denunciar el acto criminal antietico nunca visto de los bandidos militares quienes en mayo de 1980 convirtieron la tierra de Kwangju en un "bano de sangre", ellos hablan ridiculamente de "DDHH" de la RPDC.
					
					Las actuales fuerzas en el poder del Sur de Corea embellecen la dominacion de dictadura militar del pasado en que reprimio el Levantamiento Popular de Kwangju y tergiversa la historia y reprime la libertad y la democracia de los habitantes.
					
					Convirtio el territorio surcoreano en una ruina de DDHH y no protesta ante cada dia mas crecientes crimenes de violacion de DDHH de las tropas norteamericanas. A pesar de esto  habla ilogicamente de "DDHH" de alguien.
					
					Es merecido que los habitantes surcoreanos burlan como "Ministerio de Unificacion desaparecido" este aparato que recurre solo a la confrontacion fratricida armando alborotos de DDHH anti-RPDC.
					
					La banda traidora que en confabulacion con las fuerzas foraneas persigue la confrontacion fratricida y la guerra, no podra evitar la severa sentencia de la nacion.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia maniobra naval secreta en aguas cercanas a la isla Jeju
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia maniobra naval secreta en aguas cercanas a la isla Jeju
Pyongyang, 28 de mayo (ACNC) -- El pasado dia 15, Estados Unidos desarrollo en alta mar al sudeste de la isla Jeju, enclavada cerca de la Peninsula Coreana, los ejercicios maritimos conjuntos a puertas cerradas en que tomaron parte tambien Japon y el Sur de Corea.
					Esa maniobra belica tuvo por su objetivo asestar el golpe militar contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Asi subraya el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 28 y continua:
					
					En la Peninsula Coreana, donde fue creada aguda situacion politica y militar, cualquier accion militar resulta tan peligrosa como prender chispas en el polvorin.
					
					Los dias 13 y 14, EE.UU. realizo junto con los titeres surcoreanos los ejercicios maritimos conjuntos, encaminados al ataque naval contra la RPDC, movilizando hasta la flotilla del portaaviones nuclear supergrande Nimitz.
					
					Seguidamente, efectuo con Japon y el Sur de Corea otra maniobra naval secreta llevando la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana al borde de guerra.
					
					Asi se porta EE.UU. que por otra parte, aboga por la "paz" y "estabilidad" de la region y por la "paz" del mundo.
					
					Al mantener tensa la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, el imperio yanqui intenta crear el ambiente favorable a la formacion de la agresiva alianza militar trilateral con Japon y el Sur de Corea y tomar la heguemonia militar en la region de Asia y el Pacifico a base de la creacion de OTAN de version asiatica.
					
					Este hecho insinua que EE.UU. es el que perturba la paz y estabilidad de la region de Asia y el Pacifico y el resto del mundo.
					
					Es absurdo tratar de asustar a la RPDC con el recrudecimiento de presion militar.

articles.title: Minju Joson comenta chismografia de Ryu Kil Jae
articles.content:
Minju Joson comenta chismografia de Ryu Kil Jae
Pyongyang, 28 de mayo (ACNC) -- Hace poco, el ministro de Unificacion del Sur de Corea, Ryu Kil Jae, dijo que "estableceria el plan principal de derechos humanos del Norte de Corea" al promover los esfuerzos por instituir la "ley de DDHH del Norte"
					Continuo que el Norte de Corea "debe cumplir su deber principal para resolver el problema de DDHH" y "dejar la conducta de incurrir a menudo en los actos provocadores".
					
					Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual de este martes y continua:
					
					Los chismes de Ryu dejan conocer que este maniaco de confrontacion trata de empeorar las relaciones intercoreanas inculcando la hostilidad a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					En la RPDC, donde se elaboran y se realizan todas las politicas y actividades del Estado bajo la consigna "!Todo para el pueblo y todo apoyandose en las masas populares!", se respetan y se garantizan los DDHH.
					
					Al contrario, en el Sur de Corea se violan de la peor manera los DDHH.
					
					Sin embargo, los titeres surcoreanos hablan ridiculamente del "establecimiento del plan principal de DDHH del Norte" y el "cumplimiento del deber principal por el Norte".
					
					Lo mas grave del caso es que Ryu se atrevio a criticar a la RPDC diciendo que "ella debe dejar la conducta de incurrir a menudo en los actos provocadores".
					
					Con ese disparate, Ryu quiso encubrir su responsabilidad de haber buscado el peligro de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana enganando la opinion publica y estigmatizar a la RPDC de "provocadora".
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos deben darse cuenta de que su campana de DDHH anti-RPDC aceleraria su autodestruccion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena la negativa de politicos japoneses al expediente criminal
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena la negativa de politicos japoneses al expediente criminal
Pyongyang, 28 de mayo (ACNC) -- Hace poco, el jefe del Consejo de Investigacion Politica del Partido Democratico Liberal de Japon, Takaichi, manifesto publicamente su posicion de negar la historia criminal del imperialismo japones, diciendo que no puede dar consentimiento a la "Declaracion de Murayama" que pide perdon por el colonialismo y las agresiones del siglo pasado. 
					El co-representante del Partido de Restauracion y alcalde de Osaka, Hashimoto, tambien nego el crimen de esclavitud sexual impuesta para el viejo ejercito japones. 
					
					El otro co-representante Ishihara y el secretario general del mismo partido, Matsui, y otros trataron de dar razon al disparate de Hashimoto insistiendo en la necesidad de esclavitud sexual en aquel entonces. 
					
					El diario Rodong Sinmun, en un comentario individual de este martes, senala que en estos dias, se escucha mas que nunca el paquete de disparates de las fuerzas gobernantes japonesas que niegan la historia, y continua:
					
					Ahora el circulo politico de Japon va por la senda ultraderechista y militarista. 
					
					Los politiqueros japoneses tanto del partido en el poder como de los partidos de oposicion no pierden ninguna oportunidad para negar el expediente criminal del pasado y abogan por enmendar la constitucion y convertir a Japon en potencia militar. 
					
					La negacion de la historia criminal de agresiones es una expresion del intento de repetirla al resucitar el fantasma del militarismo. 
					
					Pero, eso es una tonteria igual a meterse en el fuego con gasolina.
					
					Japon no tiene otro remedio que reconocer su historia criminal, pedir disculpas e indemnizar por el respecto.
